HelpXML.Title: cascade
HelpXML.Purpose: cascade is a third party function used in FSDA demos and examples
HelpXML.Description: function cascade cascades existing figures so that they don't directly overlap cascade takes and returns no arguments. This function will cascade as many figures as will fit the height/width of the screen. If there are more figures than can cascade in a screen, those additional figures are left in their original position.

References.Item: Tufte E.R. (1983). The visual display of quantitative information. Graphics Press, Cheshire

Item.Title: Cascade multiple figures.
